title: DEVOPS ENGINEER (M/W/D)
body:
We are seeking for a DevOps ENGINEER (f/m) who has a strong sense of ownership

about his/her work, is eager to learn and share his/her knowledge within our team and strives for finding

the best solution to a customer problem.

Humai Technologies (www.humai.tech) was founded in 1998 as a spin-off from the Vienna University of

Technology and the Berndorf Industry Group, with the mission to develop first-class solutions by using

Artificial intelligence (AI), Machine learning, Virtual Reality (VR), and Augmented Reality (AR) based solutions.

We now have a total of three divisions:

  • Mobile Machine Assistants for industrial plants and machine manufacturers
  • Parts and component group recognition with our Partium search technology
  • MagicLens – Interactive 3D and Augmented Reality visualizations

ROLE: • Transformation of business requirements into software solutions
  • Manage different environments (development, QA and Production)
  • Be part of the incident management and identify mitigations
  • Define deployment plans and manage software releases
  • Increase degree of automation across teams, projects and products
  • Identify pro-actively solutions for costs and performance optimization
  • Establish a DevOps culture across the Company


SKILLS REQUIRED:
  • 3 years’ experience in software development with focus on IT
architectures, operations, monitoring, security, standards and
procedures, systems managed on premises as well as in the cloud
  • Experience with at least one container technologies such as Docker,
Kubernetes or private Cloud solutions such as OpensStack or Cloud
Foundry
  • Configuration management via Ansible, Puppet or Chef and some
experience with source automation server like Jenkins, Hudson or
Gitlab
  • Proficient in spoken English or German


NICE TO HAVE:

  • Experience with Azure, AWS or GCP
  • You can maintain GPU-based and MEAN applications
  • You have experience in network, server, and application-status
monitoring




WHAT WE
OFFER:

  • The opportunity to work on exciting projects with our AI solutions on-
cloud and on-site premises
  • Chance to grow and expand your skills and expertise in our rapidly
growing company
  • Flexible working hours (home office options), the stability of a company
with 20 years of experience and support by one of Austria‘s leading
industry groups combined with the enthusiasm and tightknit feeling of
a start-up
  • Friday game nights, free snacks and drinks, chance to unwind and build
better connections to your colleagues
  • Join in on one of our numerous company events such as: soccer
matches, paddle boarding, hackathons, ladies (and boys, too) nights,
evenings out in the town, culinary workshops, game nights and much
more



HOW TO APPLY:

If you are interested to meet us and discuss

any opportunities, please send your

application to jobs@humai.tech. Please

include at least one concise CV as well as

any information that you find convincing

about your ability to perform in the

described position.

Reference for this position:
